Title: VSP unions serve strike notice
Content: All the unions of Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Limited-Visakhapatnam Steel Plant on Wednesday served a notice on the management and Regional Labour Commissioner threatening to go on a 24-hour strike from 6 a
Author: Special Correspondent
